alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 8:41AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clayton and central Grant Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 841 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Luxemburg, or 9 miles south of Guttenberg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Guttenberg and Cassville around 850 AM CDT. Bloomington around 905 AM CDT. Lancaster around 915 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Big H Campground, Camp C.S. Klaus, North Buena Vista, Mount Ida, Turkey River, Beetown, Union, Stitzer, Fairview and Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
